name: backend
description: Dogsi is a comprehensive online marketplace for buying and selling dog products 🐕🛒. Built with Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Sequelize, React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Redux, 🐶 Dogsi offers a secure, user-friendly platform for all dog enthusiasts 🛍️. Additionally, we are also creating a vibrant community of dog owners 🐾❤️.
author: Himanshu Chuchra
